room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape Virtuality in New York
review: Unbelievable experience! Highly recommend. Super friendly staff.

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape Virtuality in New York
review: I bought a Groupon for this place for the virtuality games and it was very fun. Michael was very helpful and entertaining. My three friends and I spent an hour here. The only thing that I did not like is that the workers have to set the games up for you and that takes more time from your actual games. I recommend.
